Discover premium ColdLand Knives, in Canada and the USA, expertly crafted for precision, durability, and performance. Perfect for outdoor adventures, hunting, and culinary use. Shop high-quality knives designed to last and outdoor apparel. Explore our collection today!

The idea of ColdLand Knives as a brand was born in 2010 and ColdLand was first registered as a company in Montreal (Quebec), Canada in 2011. Then we moved to Edmonton (Alberta), Canada in 2012. ColdLand is a registered, fully Canadian owned and operated company.
